author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Place the courgette into a bowl with the balsamic vinegar and olive oil. Let it stand for four minutes. For the tzatziki, place the Greek yogurt, mint and spring onion into a bowl and mix well. To serve, place the courgette ribbons in a pile onto a plate, with the tzatziki spooned over the top.
